Class ListAdapter

java.lang.Object
adapter.ListAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
HCollection, HList
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class ListAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HList
Adapter for HSet

    • add

      public void add​(int index, java.lang.Object element)
      Inserts the specified element at the specified position in this list (optional operation). Shifts the element currently at that position (if any) and any subsequent elements to the right (adds one to their indices).
      Specified by:
      add in interface HList
      Parameters:
      index - index at which the specified element is to be inserted.
      element - element to be inserted.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified element is null and this list does not support null elements.

      Questo metodo effettua un inserimento nel vector richiamando vector.insertElement(element, index)

    • add

      Specified by:
      add in interface HCollection
      Specified by:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified element is null and this list does not support null elements.

    • addAll

      public boolean addAll​(HCollection c)
      Appends all of the elements in the specified collection to the end of this list, in the order that they are returned by the specified collection's iterator (optional operation).
      Specified by:
      addAll in interface HCollection
      Specified by:
      addAll in interface HList
      Parameters:
      c - collection whose elements are to be added to this list.
      Returns:
      true if this list changed as a result of the call.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified collection contains one or more null elements and this list does not support null elements, or if the specified collection is null.

      Questo metodo richiama vector.addElement(o) per ogni elmento della HCollection

      Questo metodo restituisce un array contenente tutti gli elementi della lista

    • toArray

      public java.lang.Object[] toArray​(java.lang.Object[] a)
      Returns an array containing all of the elements in this list in proper sequence; the runtime type of the returned array is that of the specified array.
      Specified by:
      toArray in interface HCollection
      Specified by:
      toArray in interface HList
      Parameters:
      a - the array into which the elements of this list are to be stored, if it is big enough; otherwise, a new array of the same runtime type is allocated for this purpose.
      Returns:
      an array containing the elements of this list.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified array is null.

      Questo metodo inserisce tutti gli elementi della List in un array e lo restituisce, se il paramtero ha lunghezza maggiore della size() il restante spazio verrà riempito da null, viceversa verranno troncati gli elementi
